trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class that defines the methods, properties and events common to all controls in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls"></xref> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 用作定义中的所有控件的方法、 属性和事件公共基类<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls"></xref>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The WebControl class provides the properties, methods, and events that are common to all Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: WebControl 类提供属性、 方法和事件所共有的所有 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of a Web server control by setting properties defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置此类中定义的属性控制的外观和行为的 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the background color and font color of a control are controlled by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，通过使用控制的背景色和字体颜色的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以显示边框的控件，你可以控制的边框宽度、 边框样式和边框颜色通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The size of a Web server control can be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用指定的 Web 服务器控件的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of the control can be specified by setting certain properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置某些属性指定控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: You can enable and disable a control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以启用和禁用控件的设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The place of the control in the tab order is controlled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置控制的 tab 键顺序中的控件的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a ToolTip for the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置指定控件的工具提示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all controls support every property defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 并非所有控件都支持此类中定义的每个属性。

trans-unit.source: For specific information about whether a property is supported, see the documentation for the specific control.
trans-unit.target: 有关属性是否受支持的特定信息，请参阅特定控件的文档。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some properties in this class render differently, depending on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 中此类的某些属性呈现方式不同，具体取决于浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Some properties do not render at all, while others render, but have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 其他呈现，但不起作用，某些属性不在所有呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object determines the way in which a Web server control renders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>对象确定在其中一个 Web 服务器控件呈现的方式。</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support HTML 4.0, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A> property will contain a regular <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object, and most properties will be rendered using HTML 4.0 style attributes.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器支持 HTML 4.0<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A>属性将包含正则表达式<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>对象，并且大多数属性将呈现使用 HTML 4.0 样式特性。</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.TagWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Browsers that are not known to support HTML 4.0 will use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 将使用的浏览器不知道是否支持 HTML 4.0<xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: This will automatically map the style attributes to any relevant HTML 3.2 tag attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这会自动映射到任何相关的 HTML 3.2 标记特性的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, such as with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property, the style attributes will be converted into additional tags, such as `<font>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，如与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>属性，样式特性将转换为其他标记，如`<font>`标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, there will be no mapping performed.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，将没有映射执行。

trans-unit.source: For specific information about how a property is rendered in different browsers, see the documentation for the specific property.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将属性呈现在不同的浏览器中的特定信息，请参阅特定属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of WebControl, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: WebControl 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>类，表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_Span" name="Span" href=""> </xref> HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class that represents a `Span` HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类，表示`Span`HTML 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>的实例的初始属性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagKey`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> enumeration value.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is not called directly.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |`TagKey`|<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>枚举值。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 不直接调用此构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>类使用指定的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类使用指定的 HTML 标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |`TagKey`|<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>枚举值。 | |`TagName`|值`tag`参数。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 不直接调用此构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is often called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TagKey%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TagName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它通常由用于初始化的派生类的构造函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TagKey%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TagName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TagName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TagKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: An HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> class using the specified HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>类使用指定的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类使用指定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>的实例的初始属性值
