trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |`TagKey`|<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>指定的枚举值`tag`参数。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许你能够快速导航到 Web 服务器控件的访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the AccessKey property to specify the keyboard shortcut for the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: AccessKey 属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to navigate quickly to the control by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过按键盘上的 ALT 键和指定的字符的密钥快速导航到控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the access key of a control to the string `"D"` indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将控件的访问密钥设置为 string`"D"`指示用户可以导航到该控件通过按 ALT + D。

trans-unit.source: Only a single character string is allowed for the AccessKey property.
trans-unit.target: AccessKey 属性允许仅是单字符字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, <xref:System.String>, nor a single character string, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试将此属性设置为一个值，既不是`null`， <xref:System.String>，也不是单字符字符串，将引发异常。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 仅在 Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The access key for quick navigation to the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 快速导航到 Web 服务器控件的的访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String>，指示未设置此属性。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The specified access key is neither <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, <xref:System.String> nor a single character string.
trans-unit.target: 指定的访问键既不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，<xref:System.String>也不是单个字符字符串。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTML 特性和需要呈现的样式添加到指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: To render attributes and styles for a Web Server control on the client, you typically call the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 若要将呈现客户端上的 Web 服务器控件的特性和样式，通常调用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来插入每个特性和样式单独到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>输出流。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 若要简化过程，此方法封装了对所有调用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>对于每个属性和与 Web 服务器控件关联的样式的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddStyleAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All attributes and styles are inserted into the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream in a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 所有特性和样式都插入到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>在单个方法调用的输出流。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for the class.
trans-unit.target: 通常由控件开发人员在派生类中，插入适当的特性和样式复制到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>输出流的类</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>中重写此方法

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The AddAttributesToRender method cannot be used to insert client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> AddAttributesToRender 方法无法用于插入客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: To use client script, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用客户端脚本，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Copies any nonblank elements of the specified style to the Web control, overwriting any existing style elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式的所有非空元素复制到 Web 控件，覆盖任何现有的控件的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that represents the style to be copied.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，表示要复制的样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of arbitrary attributes (for rendering only) that do not correspond to properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: （对于仅呈现） 获取的任意属性的集合在控件上的属性不对应。

trans-unit.source: The Attributes collection contains a collection of all attributes declared in the opening tag of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 特性集合包含在 Web 服务器控件的开始标记中声明的所有特性的集合。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the attributes associated with a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你以编程方式控制与 Web 服务器控件关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can add attributes to the collection or remove attributes from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将属性添加到集合，或从集合中移除属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is rendered with all attributes in the collection in the control’s opening tag, regardless of the browser settings.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性呈现的控件的开始标记，而不考虑浏览器设置中的集合中的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Not all browsers support every attribute that is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有浏览器支持呈现的每个属性。

trans-unit.source: The unsupported attributes are usually ignored by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 通过浏览器通常忽略属性不受支持。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot add client-side script to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> instance using the Attributes collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 无法添加客户端将脚本保存到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>实例使用的属性集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: To add client-side script, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加客户端脚本，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection"></xref> of name and value pairs.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection"> </xref>的名称和值对。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Use the BackColor property to specify the background color of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用设置<xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property will render for only certain controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性将只为某些控件呈现。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> will render this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>将呈现此属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: It will also work for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`.
trans-unit.target: 它还将适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>如果其`RepeatLayout`属性是`RepeatLayout.Table`，而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: In general, only controls that render as a `<table>` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，仅呈现为`<table>`标记可以显示的背景色 HTML 3.2 中而几乎任何控件可以在 HTML 4.0。

trans-unit.source: For controls that render as a `<span>` tag (including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later, but not in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.
trans-unit.target: 控件的呈现为`<span>`标记 (包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，所有验证控件和列表控件使用其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`)，该属性可用于在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 及更高版本，但不是在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，表示控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the Web control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 控件的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Use the BorderColor property to specify the border color of the Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: BorderColor 属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用设置<xref:System.Drawing.Color>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The BorderColor property will render only for certain controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> BorderColor 属性将只为某些呈现控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> controls will render this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控件将呈现此属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: It will also work for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> controls, if their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`.
trans-unit.target: 它还将适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制，如果其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`，而不`RepeatLayout.Flow`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which is not part of the HTML 3.2 standard.
trans-unit.target: 但是，呈现为`bordercolor`特性，它不是 HTML 3.2 标准的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The `bordercolor` attribute works for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.0 or later, but not most other browsers.
trans-unit.target: `bordercolor`属性适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 3.0 或更高版本，但不是大多数其他浏览器。

trans-unit.source: When the BorderColor property is not set, the browser will use its default border color.
trans-unit.target: 当未设置的 BorderColor 属性时，浏览器将使用其默认边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Refer to your browser to determine its default color scheme.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅你的浏览器，以确定其默认颜色方案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，表示控件的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the BorderStyle property to specify the border style for the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: BorderStyle 属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用其中一个设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Border Style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|The border style is not set.| |`None`|No border| |`Dotted`|A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|A solid line border.| |`Double`|A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > This property will not render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer 4 for any Web server control.
trans-unit.target: |边框样式 |说明 | |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置的边框样式。 | |`None`|无边框 | |`Dotted`|虚线边框。 | |`Dashed`|虚线边框。 | |`Solid`|实线边框。 | |`Double`|双实线边框。 | |`Groove`|用于凹陷边框外观的凹槽状的边框。 | |`Ridge`|用于引发的边框外观的突起的边框。 | |`Inset`|凹陷控件外观的内嵌边框。 | |`Outset`|用于引发的控件外观的一开始就边框。 | 1> [!NOTE] 1> 此属性将不会呈现在浏览器上早于任何 Web 服务器控件的 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4。

trans-unit.source: There is no equivalent to it in HTML 3.2.
trans-unit.target: 没有向其 HTML 3.2 中的无等效项。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the BorderWidth property to specify a border width for a control.
trans-unit.target: BorderWidth 属性用于指定控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not work with all Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性并不适用于所有 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: It applies only to controls that display as a table, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 它仅适用于这些控件将显示为表，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: This property is set with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> contains a negative number, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>包含负号，将引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The border width can be expressed only in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 可以仅以对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 的浏览器的像素为单位表示的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: All unit types are supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更高版本中支持所有单元类型。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the specific control for details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅特定控件有关的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that represents the border width of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>表示 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified border width is a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的边框宽度是负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Web 服务器控件的样式。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The ControlStyle property encapsulates all properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class that specify the appearance of the control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ControlStyle 属性封装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>指定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>的外观的类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>的所有属性

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that encapsulates the appearance properties of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>封装 Web 服务器控件的外观属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object has been created for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>对象已被创建为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This property is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object has been created for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle*> property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>对象已被创建为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle*>属性; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties not encapsulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style*> object from the specified Web server control to the Web server control that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 将未封装的属性复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style*>到 Web 服务器控件从调用此方法时，从指定的 Web 服务器控件的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The CopyBaseAttributes method copies the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> properties from the specified Web server control to the Web server control that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: CopyBaseAttributes 方法副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>到 Web 服务器控件从调用此方法时，从指定的 Web 服务器控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used in cases where a Web server control works by dynamically creating new controls while it is rendering and using the controls.
trans-unit.target: 这通常使用在其中一个 Web 服务器控件的工作原理是动态创建新控件，而是在呈现和使用的控件的情况下。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in this situation because it copies all properties of Web server controls not encapsulated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object so they can be placed on the outermost control of a tag that is being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是在此情况下有用，因为复制的未包装的 Web 服务器控件的所有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象，以便可以将它们放置在最外面的控件的标记的呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> that represents the source control with properties to be copied to the Web server control that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref> ，表示与要复制到从中调用此方法的 Web 服务器控件的属性的源控件。

trans-unit.source: controlSrc is .
trans-unit.target: controlSrcis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the style object that is used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> class to implement all style related properties.
trans-unit.target: 创建内部使用的样式对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>类，以实现所有样式与相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is used to create the style object that is used internally to implement all style related properties.
trans-unit.target: 方法用于创建内部使用，用于实现所有的样式对象 CreateControlStyle 样式相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this method to create a style that is appropriate to the class.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以重写此方法以创建一个适合于类的样式。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Control developers should return a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> that the base control returns.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**控件开发人员应返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>基控件返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: It cannot be assumed that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> is of a particular Style type since a derived control may return a different type.
trans-unit.target: 它不能假定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属于特定样式类型，因为派生的控件可能返回不同的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that is used to implement all style-related properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>用于实现所有与样式有关的控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) class rendered by the Web server control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 Web 服务器控件在客户端上呈现的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: Use the CssClass property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: CssClass 属性用于指定要在 Web 服务器控件的客户端上呈现的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: This property will render on browsers for all controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将呈现在浏览器中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: It will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 它将始终呈现为的类特性，而不考虑浏览器中。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 此示例具有一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本利用概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` <asp:TextBox id="TextBox1" ForeColor="Red" CssClass="class1" /> ``` The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` <input type=text class="class1" style="ForeColor:red"> ``` If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of a control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设有以下 Web 服务器控件声明︰``` <asp:TextBox id="TextBox1" ForeColor="Red" CssClass="class1" /> ```以前的 Web 服务器控件声明的客户端上呈现的以下 HTML:``` <input type=text class="class1" style="ForeColor:red"> ```级联样式表 (CSS) 用于自定义控件的外观，如果使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不要同时。

trans-unit.source: Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the CssClass property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 上不支持 CSS 的浏览器，设置 CssClass 属性将会产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class rendered by the Web server control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 由 Web 服务器控件在客户端上呈现 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the rendered HTML element when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要控件会被禁用时应用于呈现的 HTML 元素的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to change the name that is rendered for the DisabledCssClass property of individual Web controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于更改呈现单独的 Web 控件的 DisabledCssClass 属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, this property returns "aspNetDisabled".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性返回"aspNetDisabled"。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> is overridden in a derived class to return `false`, the value of the DisabledCssClass property is rendered as the value of the `class` attribute of the HTML element for the control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>返回派生的类中重写`false`，DisabledCssClass 属性的值呈现的值为`class`该控件的 HTML 元素的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, if there is a value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property, both CSS classes will be applied to the rendered HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下中的值是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性，这两个 CSS 类将应用于所呈现的 HTML 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `class` attribute will consist of the value of the DisabledCssClass property followed by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property, separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: `class`属性将包含的值后跟 DisabledCssClass 属性的值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性，以空格分隔。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is static, which means that you can set it only for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是静态的这意味着，你可以将其设置只能用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: Whatever value you set it to is used for all controls in a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为任意值用于 Web 应用程序中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify different values for individual controls.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定不同的单个控件的值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a class name different from the default value of "aspNetDisabled", you typically put the code to do that in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file, as shown in the following example: ```vb# Private Sub Application_Start( ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName" End Sub ``` ```c# void Application_Start(object sender, EventArgs e) { WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName"; } ```
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用的类名"aspNetDisabled"的默认值不同，通常情况下将用于在执行该操作的代码`Application_Start`方法的 Global.asax 文件中，如下面的示例中所示︰```vb# Private Sub Application_Start( ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName" End Sub ``` ```c# void Application_Start(object sender, EventArgs e) { WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName"; } ```

trans-unit.source: The CSS class that should be applied to the rendered HTML element when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 应在该控件禁用状态时应用于呈现的 HTML 元素的 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "aspNetDisabled".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"aspNetDisabled"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web server control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已启用 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: When the Enabled property of a control is set to `false`, the control typically appears dimmed.
trans-unit.target: 当控件的 Enabled 属性设置为`false`，控件通常显示为灰色。

trans-unit.source: If the control is an input element, the browser prevents the user from clicking or typing in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是一个输入的元素，浏览器可以阻止用户单击或在其中键入内容。

trans-unit.source: HTML elements that are rendered for a server control are marked as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器控件呈现的 HTML 元素被标记为禁用通过设置其`disabled`属性或其 CSS`class`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property propagates down the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将沿控件层次结构传播。

trans-unit.source: If you disable a container control, the child controls within that container are also disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用容器控件，还将禁用该容器内的子控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In a custom composite control, this inheritance behavior does not apply to controls that have not yet created their child controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在自定义的复合控件中，此继承行为不适用于尚未创建其子控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: You must either set the enabled state of the child controls when they are created, or override the Enabled property to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须是将设置的启用的状态的子控件在创建，或重写的 Enabled 属性调用时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnsureChildControls%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Disabling a control only prevents interaction with the control by the user through the browser UI.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 禁用控件只会阻止与用户通过浏览器 UI 控件的交互。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a user to craft a request that submits a postback that is processed by the page even if controls on the page are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 它是用户可以生成请求，提交页来处理，即使禁用了该页上的控件的回发。

trans-unit.source: Before you process a postback request, check to make sure that the control is enabled and visible.
trans-unit.target: 处理回发请求之前，请检查以确保控件已启用且可见。

trans-unit.source: Not all controls support this property.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有控件都支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: See the individual controls for details.
trans-unit.target: 查看有关详细信息的单个控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了控制;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将主题应用到该控件。

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 属性指示是否为指定的控件启用主题。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 当 EnableTheming 属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录搜索要应用的控件外观。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用外观。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SkinID%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 当 EnableTheming 属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SkinID%2A>未使用属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SkinID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can override the EnableTheming value set by its parent control or the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以重写由其父控件或包含的页设置的 EnableTheming 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a parent control has the EnableTheming property set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls that are contained within the parent by setting the EnableTheming property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果父控件具有 EnableTheming 属性设置为`false`，您可以有选择地应用于 EnableTheming 属性设置为父项中包含的子控件的主题`true`上各个子控件。

trans-unit.source: Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level.
trans-unit.target: 可以在页、 容器或控制级别启用主题。

trans-unit.source: When theming is disabled at the page or container level, themes are disabled for all controls that are contained by the page or container.
trans-unit.target: 当在页面或容器级别禁用主题时，禁用页面或容器中包含的所有控件的主题。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用主题;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font properties associated with the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 Web 服务器控件关联的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the Font property to specify the font properties of the Web Server control.
trans-unit.target: 字体属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`).
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含可访问的子属性以声明方式以形式`Property-Subproperty`(例如`Font-Bold`) 或以编程方式中的窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如`Font.Bold`)。

trans-unit.source: All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 的所有控件之前的浏览器中将呈现所有但一个子属性。

trans-unit.source: They are: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work).
trans-unit.target: 它们是︰ <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>(但仅如名为字体大小`Small`， `Smaller`，依此类推，起作用)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Underline%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Strikeout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Names%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than later browsers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 虽然这些子属性呈现在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 之前的浏览器中，为不同于更高版本浏览器呈现的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `<b>` and `<font>`.
trans-unit.target: 而不是呈现为样式特性，这些子属性呈现为 HTML 元素，如`<b>`和`<font>`。

trans-unit.source: The one subproperty that will not render on earlier browsers for all controls is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将不会呈现在较早的所有控件的浏览器的一个子属性为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Overline%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"></xref> that represents the font properties of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"> </xref>表示 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color (typically the color of the text) of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的前景色 （通常是文本的颜色）。

trans-unit.source: Use the ForeColor property to specify the foreground color of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 前景色属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The foreground color is usually the color of the text.
trans-unit.target: 前景色通常是文本的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This property will render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls, except the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将呈现在浏览器上早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的所有控件，除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>以外的版本 4

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, this property is rendered as `<font>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在浏览器上早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4，此属性呈现为`<font>`标记。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，表示控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has attributes set.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否具有设置的特性。

trans-unit.source: The HasAttributes property returns `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> instance has attribute name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: HasAttributes 属性返回`true`时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>实例都有属性名称/值对。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The attribute pairs can be set either in the property or in the view state.
trans-unit.target: 在属性中或中的视图状态，则可以设置的属性对。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has attributes set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件具有设置; 的属性否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: Use the Height property to specify the height of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 高度属性用于指定 Web 服务器控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 此属性不会早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4 呈现在浏览器中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, and any validation controls.
trans-unit.target: 无法呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性的控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和任何验证控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>也不呈现在较早的浏览器中的此属性时其`RepeatLayout`属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers.
trans-unit.target: 此外，只有单元类型的`Pixel`和`Percentage`较早的浏览器都支持。

trans-unit.source: Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>, do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.
trans-unit.target: 由于此属性为非标准 HTML，Web 服务器控件显示为表，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>，不支持此属性在浏览器中早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 4。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To set the Height property to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 高度设置为一个单元的属性类型不是默认的`Pixel`，你必须创建新的单位类型特定于所需的单位类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, to set a control's Height property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.Width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > For more information on the unit types available for the Height property, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要将控件的高度属性设置为 100 的百分比值，无法执行以下: >> `myWebControl.Width = Unit.Percentage(100);` >> 可供高度属性的单位类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that represents the height of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> ，表示控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The height was set to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 高度设置为负值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用该控件。

trans-unit.source: This is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 这是只读的属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to disable a control, you set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要禁用的控件，则设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a control is not contained by another control, the value of the IsEnabled property is always the same as the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不包含的另一个控件，IsEnabled 属性的值将始终的值相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsEnabled property has a value that is different from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property if a control is a child of another control and if all the following circumstances are true: - The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property or the IsEnabled property of the parent control is `false`.
trans-unit.target: IsEnabled 属性具有值不同于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性如果控件是另一个控件的子级，并且所有以下情况下为真:-的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性或父控件的 IsEnabled 属性是`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of the child control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>子控件的属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the child control inherits the disabled state of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，子控件将继承父控件的已禁用的状态。

trans-unit.source: The IsEnabled property of the child control returns `false` to indicate that the control is disabled even though the child control was not explicitly disabled by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 子控件的 IsEnabled 属性返回`false`以指示该控件禁用，即使子控件已不显式禁用通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent control itself might have its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property set to `true` but might inherit the disabled state from its parent, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 父控件本身可能将其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性设置为`true`但可能会从其父项继承禁用的状态，依次类推。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET renders HTML elements for a server control, it marks the elements as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 呈现时的服务器控件的 HTML 元素时，它可以标记的元素，因为禁用设置其`disabled`属性或其 CSS`class`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A>。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.ControlRenderingCompatibilityVersion%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> object is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>对象是已启用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: 从已保存的上一个请求还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method restores the view-state information that was saved during a previous <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A> request.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法还原已在上一个过程中保存的视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A>请求。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>方法以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Copies any nonblank elements of the specified style to the Web control, but will not overwrite any existing style elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 将复制到 Web 的指定任何的样式非空白元素控制，但将不会覆盖任何现有的控件的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that represents the style to be copied.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，表示要复制的样式。

trans-unit.source: Renders the control to the specified HTML writer.
trans-unit.target: 将控件呈现给指定的 HTML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The Render method sends the Web control to the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> instance.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法将发送到指定的 Web 控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Override this method to send your custom server control to the client.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将自定义服务器控件发送到客户端。

trans-unit.source: The Render method first calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A> method, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A> method, and finally the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> method to send the control to the client.
trans-unit.target: 呈现器方法的第一个调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>方法，以及最后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A>方法︰ 向控件发送到客户端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收控件内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML opening tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 打开指定的编写器该控件的标记的 HTML 呈现。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: This is made public so other controls can render multiple controls in between the opening and closing tags of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，其他控件可以呈现的开始和结束标记的 Web 服务器控件之间的多个控件，这是所公共。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the contents of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 将控件内容呈现给指定的编写器。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Override the RenderContents method to render the contents of the control between the begin and end tags.
trans-unit.target: 重写 RenderContents 方法，以呈现到开始和结束标记之间控件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method renders any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现会呈现任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: If your control has child controls, you must either call the base RenderContents method or call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> at the point where you want the child controls to be rendered to the text writer.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件具有子控件，必须调用基 RenderContents 方法或调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>想要呈现到文本编写器的子控件的点处。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML closing tag of the control into the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 呈现到指定的编写器关闭的控件的标记的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: This is made public so other controls can render multiple controls in between the opening and closing tags of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，其他控件可以呈现的开始和结束标记的 Web 服务器控件之间的多个控件，这是所公共。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 将保存已修改后的任何状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the cumulative values of the properties for a server control.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是累积的服务器控件属性的值。

trans-unit.source: These values are placed automatically in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for the server control, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值自动放置在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>的实例的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the life cycle for the server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性值随后会保存到一个字符串对象的保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML `input` element.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在隐藏 HTML`input`元素。

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the SaveViewState method and modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for your server control.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写 SaveViewState 方法并修改提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件; 的当前视图状态的对象否则为如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用控件的外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。

trans-unit.source: The SkinID property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: SkinID 属性指定哪些这些将应用于控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin setting between controls of different types.
trans-unit.target: 外观是特定于特定的控件;不能共享之间的不同类型的控件的外观设置。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the SkinID property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 SkinID 属性，控件将使用的默认外观，如果已定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control, then that skin applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果而无需外观 ID 为定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制，则该外观适用于所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控件，不显式引用它按 ID 的外观和，未设置为禁用主题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: If a skin with an ID is defined for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control, then that skin applies to only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls whose SkinID is set to that ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有 ID 的外观定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控件，然后外观适用于仅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控件其 SkinID 设置为该 id。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified SkinID, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定 SkinID，外观<xref:System.ArgumentException>在运行时引发异常。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于控件的外观的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The skin specified in the SkinID property does not exist in the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题中不存在 SkinID 属性中指定的外观。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of text attributes that will be rendered as a style attribute on the outer tag of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取将呈现为 Web 服务器控件的外部标记上的样式属性的文本特性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the Style collection to manage the style attributes rendered in the outer tag of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 使用样式集合来管理 Web 服务器控件的外部标记中呈现的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: This property will render on all browsers for all controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将在所有控件的所有浏览器上呈现。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Browsers that do not support style attributes will ignore the rendered HTML.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 浏览器不支持样式特性将忽略呈现的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Any style values set through the strongly typed style properties (for example, `BackColor="Red"`) will automatically override a corresponding value in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过强类型的样式属性设置的任何样式值 (例如， `BackColor="Red"`) 将自动重写此集合中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: Values set in this collection are not automatically reflected by the strongly typed style properties.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中设置的值不会自动反映通过强类型的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"></xref> that contains the HTML style attributes to render on the outer tag of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection"> </xref>包含要在 Web 服务器控件的外部标记上的呈现的 HTML 样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否应设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref>到呈现的 HTML 元素的属性"disabled"时控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, this property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Disabling ASP.NET Web Controls When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of an ASP.NET control is set to `false` (that is, when the control is disabled), the intent is that ASP.NET should render the control in the page, but display it in a disabled state (typically dimmed).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web 控件时禁用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>ASP.NET 控件的属性设置为`false`（即，当控件为禁用），其目的是 ASP.NET 应呈现在页中，控件，但显示处于禁用状态 （通常显示为灰色）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a parent control is disabled, children of that control are also displayed as disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了父控件，该控件的子级也会显示为禁用。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the child control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `false`, even though its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property might be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，子控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`false`，即使其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>属性可能设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, when a control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property is `false`, ASP.NET sets the `disabled` attribute to "disabled" in the HTML element that it renders for the control.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和更早版本中，当控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性是`false`，ASP.NET 集`disabled`属性为"disabled"中的控件呈现的 HTML 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the HTML 4.01 standard allows the `disabled` attribute only on certain elements that are used for user input.
trans-unit.target: 但是，HTML 4.01 标准允许`disabled`属性仅用于用户输入的某些元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `disabled` attribute is allowed for `input` elements, but not for `span` elements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`disabled`属性可用于进行`input`元素，但不是能为`span`元素。

trans-unit.source: Most browsers support a default disabled appearance for display-only elements that have `disabled` attributes.
trans-unit.target: 大多数浏览器支持仅显示的元素具有禁用的默认外观`disabled`属性。

trans-unit.source: However, in order to comply with HTML standards, by default ASP.NET 4 omits invalid attributes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，为了符合 HTML 标准，默认情况下 ASP.NET 4 忽略无效的特性。

trans-unit.source: How the SupportsDisabledAttribute Property is Used If the SupportsDisabledAttribute property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如何 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性时，使用 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性是`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时该控件禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时该控件禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override this property to return `false` if all the following conditions are true: - The control renders an HTML element that does not support the `disabled` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类重写此属性以返回`false`如果满足所有以下条件:-控件呈现的 HTML 元素将不支持`disabled`属性。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>属性指示 ASP.NET 版本号低于 4.0。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SupportsDisabledAttribute property does not necessarily indicate whether the HTML element that is rendered for a control supports (allows) the `disabled` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性不一定表示为控件呈现的 HTML 元素是否支持 （允许）`disabled`属性。

trans-unit.source: If a control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0, the value of the control's SupportsDisabledAttribute property might return `true` even if the rendered HTML does not support the `disabled` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>属性指示 ASP.NET 版本号低于 4.0，则控件的 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性的值可能会返回`true`即使呈现的 HTML 不支持`disabled`属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: Backward Compatibility for Disabled Controls When you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file (which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property) to the earlier version number.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用 Visual Studio 从早期版本升级到 ASP.NET 4 的 Web 项目的已禁用控件的向后兼容，Visual Studio 会自动设置`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 文件中的属性 (哪些集<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>属性) 到更早的版本号。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the SupportsDisabledAttribute property always returns `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property is lower than 4.0, this causes Web controls to render HTML for disabled controls as they did in the earlier version.
trans-unit.target: 因为 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性始终返回`true`时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>属性低于 4.0，这会导致 Web 控件，像在早期版本中那样，已禁用控件的呈现 HTML。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用 ASP.NET 4 中引入的算法呈现 HTML 的升级的 Web 站点，你可以更改或删除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting a Disabled Appearance By Using CSS If the SupportsDisabledAttribute property of a control is `false` and the control is disabled, ASP.NET sets the `class` attribute of the rendered HTML element to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 禁用外观由使用 CSS 的情况下设置控件的 SupportsDisabledAttribute 属性是`false`并且控件将禁用 ASP.NET 集`class`呈现的 HTML 元素的值的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is "aspNetDisabled".
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是"aspNetDisabled"。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To provide a disabled appearance for disabled controls, you must define a CSS rule for the class that is represented by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供禁用已禁用控件的外观，你必须定义的值表示类的 CSS 规则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The HTML element that is rendered for a control might have more than one value in its `class` attribute if there is a value in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控件可能具有多个值呈现的 HTML 元素其`class`属性中的值是否其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.DisabledCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
